channel.title: Host Got Booted
channel.description:
These people the "HgB" over xbox live are I.P. flooding random players over it. and for some reason i haven't been attacked yet.
Their website is: [url=http://hostgotbooted.net/]http://hostgotbooted.net/[/url]
Anybody heard of this? or have been attacked?
I mean it's funny on how these no-lifers are so pathetic as to actually I.P. flood someone.

[quote=“Thug-life, post:5, topic:207410”]That £40 a year buys you this? Xbox live is probably one of the biggest online gaming communitys in the world and things as serious as this still exist?
Pathetic.[/quote]
That’s coz itz made by the communists microsoft
